column1: Smoque BBQ////My group of 4 decided to share a bunch of stuff: 1.25 lb of sliced brisket
column2: full slab of baby back ribs
column6: and 3 cornbreads. Â We chose sliced brisket over chopped for its higher fat content
column7: definitely worth the extra calories. Included with the order were 3 types of sauce (Memphis style
column9: Carolina style). The Spicy Memphis was my favorite -- I dipped everything in it! While the four of us were able to finish everything
column10: we were absolutely STUFFED. We probably should have gotten one less side and stuck with 1 lb of brisket.
